system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision color. Implementation interface.%NSee ev_color.e" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "color, pixel, rgb, 8, 16, 24" date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 10:23:22 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100056 $"
deferred class interface ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xmlEV_COLOR_I
feature -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create zero intinsity color. ensure then default_name_assigned: ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_namename.Falseis_equal (../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_default_nameDefault_name) red_zero: ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_redred = 0.Falseto_real green_zero: ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_greengreen = 0.Falseto_real blue_zero: ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_blueblue = 0.Falseto_real
feature -- Implementation
f_default_name../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_default_nameDefault_name: FalseSTRING_32 = "noname" -- To be used as ../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_namename when none is supplied.
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_color_short.xmlEV_COLOR note option: stable
f_delta../implementation_interface/ev_color_i_short.xml#f_deltadelta: FalseREAL_32 -- Amount by which two intensities can differ but still be -- considered equal by Falseis_equal.
